entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
